Name: Daylife in Japan - Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
About the game: Daylife in Japan is a jigsaw puzzle game with pixelart GIFs instead of images. Recreate beautiful moments about daylife in Japan. 5 beautiful and originally created Pixel Art GIFs to assemble; Original music composed specially for this game; 5 different levels of difficulty;
